## Enumerations

|  Enumeration | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [TrackedState](./blockly.renderedconnection.trackedstate.md) | Enum for different kinds of tracked states.<!-- -->WILL\_TRACK means that this connection will add itself to the db on the next moveTo call it receives.<!-- -->UNTRACKED means that this connection will not add itself to the database until setTracking(true) is explicitly called.<!-- -->TRACKED means that this connection is currently being tracked. |
